notesStmt.note: This manuscript consists of a note, handwritten by Whitman, in a visitor's book for Manhattan Public School #13. Whitman's entry, dated September 3, 1841, is one of several on the page. A photostat of the page can be found in Freedman's book, facing page 32.

monogr.author: Florence Bernstein Freedman
monogr.title: Walt Whitman Looks at the Schools

bibl.author: Walt Whitman
bibl.title: Walter Whitman, of Suffolk co
bibl.orgName: The location of this manuscript is unknown.

body.ab: Walter Whitman, of Suffolk co. LI. spent two hours at School No 13 examined the classes in Grammar and Arithmetic and was highly gratified by the promptness and the understanding spirit which mark'dmarked the pupils.—VisittedVisited several schools and upon the whole considers this to be the best managed of any he has seen as yet. Sept 3d—1841
